original_text: He built altars in the temple of the Lord, of which the Lord had said, “In Jerusalem I will put my Name.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 전에 이르시기를 내가 내 이름을 예루살렘에 두리라 하신 여호와의 성전에 제단들을 쌓고

sentences.original_text: He built altars in the temple of the Lord
of which the Lord had said
In Jerusalem I will put my Name
